faq.q: Conserve-t-il la transparence?
faq.a: Oui. Toolaze est spﾃｩcifiquement conﾃｧu pour prﾃｩserver le canal Alpha pendant le processus de compression.

faq.q: Puis-je traiter plusieurs fichiers ﾃ la fois?
faq.a: Vous pouvez traiter par lots jusqu'ﾃ 100 fichiers PNG en une seule session.

faq.q: Will my PNG images look pixelated after compression?
faq.a: No. Toolaze uses intelligent compression algorithms that preserve visual quality while reducing file size. The compression focuses on removing invisible data and optimizing the image structure rather than reducing resolution unnecessarily.

faq.q: Are my design assets uploaded to a server?
faq.a: No! All compression happens locally in your browser using JavaScript and Canvas API. Your PNG images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and security for your design work.

faq.q: What's the difference between PNG and JPG compression?
faq.a: PNG compression preserves transparency (Alpha channel) and is lossless, making it ideal for graphics with transparent backgrounds. JPG compression removes transparency and uses lossy compression, which is better for photographs but unsuitable for graphics requiring transparency.

faq.q: Can I use this for icons and logos?
faq.a: Absolutely! PNG compression to 100KB is perfect for icons, logos, and graphics that require transparency. The compression maintains sharp edges and transparent backgrounds, ensuring your branding assets look professional on any background.
